title: Brideshead revisited. Episodes 02 & 03
brief_description: After a golden summer spent at Brideshead with Sebastian, Charles goes with his friend to Venice where Lord Marchmain is living with his mistress, Carla. It is there that Carla offers a prophetic insight into Sebastian’s future, saying, “He will be a drunkard”. later, over Christmas of that year, Charles’ growing friendship with the rest of the Marchmain family results in Sebastian turning away from Charles. Sebastian turns to “the bottle”.
